nodes.text: F-24-AMTx, also known simply as F-24, was a masculine F series repair droid with green photoreceptors and silver plating, with a red trim. By the year 4.3 ABY, he was employed by the Star Tours travel agency at their Tomorrowland Starport. Along with F-23-DKMx, F-24 performed the final assembly of StarSpeeder 3000 and serviced their ion engines, and was stationed in front of a vertical moving lift.

F-24-AMTx was created for Tokyo Disneyland's simulator ride theme park attraction Star Tours, which opened on July 12, 1989. In Star Tours: The Adventures Continue, the ride's sequel, a what appears to be a modified F-24 has now been moved further inside the queue, though his name is no longer visible. The droid and two others have been posed in a similar manner to a trio of ghosts seen at the end of the Haunted Mansion ride in various Disney theme parks.
